name: file
description: A plugin that determines the mime type of a file based on its content, rather than just its file extension. This can be useful for identifying the true nature of a file, especially if it has an incorrect or missing extension.

process.description: Determines the mime type of a file based on its content.

filePath.description: The path to the file to be analyzed.

mimeType.description: The mime type of the file.

installed.description: Check if the file plugin is installed and available for use.
Indicates whether the file plugin is installed.

install.description: Install the file plugin if it is not already installed.

success.description: Indicates whether the file plugin was successfully installed.
